Falsified date: The expert notes that the tweet claims to be from November 2009, but there is no record of it prior to April 2020. This discrepancy in the date further supports the conclusion that the tweet is a modern creation.
Character limit: The expert points out that the tweet contains nearly 300 characters, while in November 2009, Twitter had a limit of 140 characters per tweet. This inconsistency raises doubts about the authenticity of the tweet.
